metadata.synopsis: Two nobles arguing in Lady's Jannath's art exhibition. They're very heated, and will go outside to duel at the end of the dialogue. One of them
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to angry noble in CTY_Main_A -248; 25; -51

0.speaker: Sir Gorran Penghyst
0.text: Give me back my gold. I spent half my fortune on that bloody painting of yours!
0.context: NodeContext: Really pissed off, about to blow his fuse - this man owes him a refund

2.speaker: Lord Delwaer Jeth
2.text: As well you should have. Because it isn't a counterfeit!
2.context: NodeContext: angry, slightly amused at the misfortune of the man he's arguing with

1.speaker: Sir Gorran Penghyst
1.text: Then you leave me no choice, sir. We settle this outside. Now!
1.context: NodeContext: Really pissed off, challenging the other man to a duel
